name: Raiden
title: The Thunder God
subtitle: A divine being who harnesses the power of lightning and storms
lore: The God of Thunder and protector of Earthrealm, Raiden wields the immense power of lightning and storms. His mastery over electrical forces allows him to strike down enemies with devastating thunderbolts while shielding his allies. Despite his divine status, Raiden fights alongside mortals to defend the realms from those who would threaten them.

passive.name: Storm's Wrath
passive.description: Raiden's next basic attack deals bonus [45/90/155/325/450 + (35% AP)] and briefly slows the target by [10%] for [1] second. This cooldown is reduced by 1 second for each enemy hit by his abilities and basic attacks. The cooldown is [10s/10s/8s/7s/6s].

Q.name: Lightning Bolt
Q.description: Raiden hurls a bolt of lightning at a target location [85/170/310/455/700 + (50%AP)] to the first enemy hit and stunning them for 1 second. If the lightning bolt hits an enemy champion it chains to nearby enemies (Max 3) dealing [45% of the original] damage.

W.name: Thunder Strike
W.description: Raiden calls down a bolt of lightning on a targeted area dealing [40%AP] and slowing enemies by [20%] for [1] second. If an enemy is hit by the center of the strike they take [80%AP] damage instead and stunned for [1] second.

E.name: Electric Dash
E.description: Raiden dashes a short distance dealing [35/60/175/300/375 + (35%AP)] damage to enemies he passes through and gaining a shield based on [200%] of the damage dealt that absorbs damage for [2.5] second. Upon takedown the ability resets.

R.name: Storm's Fury
R.description: Raiden channels his power roots himself summoning a massive storm in an area around him for maximum of [5] seconds. Enemies within the storm are struck by lightning every second dealing [80% AP] damage. Raiden gains [55%] damage reduction for the duration.
